kreport.name: loadForFactoryBill

condition.name: factoryId
condition.extend: select o.id,o.org_name from sec_org o where o.org_name in( '亿迅IBSS/CRM', 'MBOSS省集中CRM系统支撑厂家', 'MBOSS省集中SPS系统支撑厂家', '亿迅大客户管理系统CMMS', '亿迅网厅和掌厅', '亿迅维系挽留系统' )

kreport.ksql: --厂家工作量统计清单（查询时间段内进入厂家的工单，不包括回退和撤消的工单） select f.serialno 工单编号,f.title 工单标题,n.executername 处理人,n.executedate 处理时间, decode(sign(ar.total_time-ar.used_time/60000),-1,'是','否') 是否超时, decode(nvl(r2.r2,r1.r1),1,'是','否') 是否重派 from rec_flow f,v_rank v_r,chk_assessment_result ar, ( select dgn.flowlsh,dgn.nodelsh,dgn.status,dgn.executercode,dgn.executername,dgn.executedate,row_number() over (partition by dgn.flowlsh order by dgn.gendate desc) rn from rec_node dgn where dgn.flowcode='86b47b100a11226801c8c29cc4f3df3f' --故障流程 and dgn.nodecode='8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30' --经过厂家处理环节 and dgn.executergrouporgid=${factoryId} --厂家 and dgn.status not in('SC','TH') #[and dgn.executercode not in(${outers})] ) n, ( --厂家处理过多次 select n.flowlsh,1 r1 from ( select n.flowlsh,n.nodecode,n.prenodelsh,lag (n.nodelsh,1,0) over (PARTITION BY n.flowlsh order by n.nodelsh) lagnodelsh from rec_node n where n.nodecode ='8707d5ab0a112268006fa804cb1cbc30' and n.executergrouporgid=${factoryId} --厂家 ) n where n.prenodelsh=n.lagnodelsh group by n.flowlsh having count(*)>1 ) r1, ( --重派单 select f.flowlsh,1 r2 from rec_flow f,rec_flow pf where f.relatedserialno is not null and pf.serialno=substr(f.serialno,0,instr(f.serialno,'-',length(f.serialno)-3)-1) and exists( select 1 from rec_node n where n.executergrouporgid=${factoryId} --厂家 ) ) r2 where f.flowlsh=n.flowlsh and n.flowlsh=ar.rec_flow_id and f.flowlsh=r1.flowlsh(+) and f.flowlsh=r2.flowlsh(+) and ar.assessment_id=v_r.assessment_id and n.rn=1 and f.status!='XJ' --不是新建单 and ar.assessment_type='O' and v_r.value=${factoryId} and n.status='YB' #[and n.executedate>=${startDate}] --首次进入时间（开始） #[and n.executedate< ${endDate}+1] --首次进入时间（结束）不包含此天
